tool_description: Elevate your information landscape with Alpha Bionics, your comprehensive source for dynamic and diverse news across myriad categories. From technology breakthroughs to sports highlights our News API seamlessly brings you real-time updates, ensuring you're always connected to the stories that matter most. Effortlessly integrate our user-friendly REST API into your applications, websites, or platforms, and explore a curated selection of news categories tailored to your preferences. With Alpha ...
name: Latest News API: Instant Access to Trending News Stories
title: Latest News API: Instant Access to Trending News Stories
tool_name: Latest News API: Instant Access to Trending News Stories

api_list.name: Category Recent Articles
api_list.description: Get the 5 most recent articles from a given category
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-news-api-instant-access-to-trending-news-stories.p.rapidapi.com/news/basketball/recent_articles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-news-api-instant-access-to-trending-news-stories.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-news-api-instant-access-to-trending-news-stories.p.rapidapi.com/news/{category}/recent_articles"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-news-api-instant-access-to-trending-news-stories.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
